Operation 'barcode-generator-post' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks specificity about input parameters, output format, supported barcode types, and response structure. AI agents need clarity on what data to provide and what format to expect in return.

data.current_description: Generate high quality QR code & barcode images in a matter of seconds
data.summary_suggestion: Generate QR codes and barcode images
data.description_suggestion: Generates high-quality QR code and barcode images from provided input data. Accepts barcode type, format, and content specifications in the request body. Returns the generated barcode image in the specified format (PNG, SVG, etc.). Supports multiple barcode standards including QR codes, Code128, EAN, and UPC formats.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks specificity about input parameters, output format, supported barcode types, and response structure. AI agents need clarity on what data to provide and what format to expect in return.

message: Operation 'content-moderation-get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, unclear_purpose. Missing summary. Description is vague about input mechanism (query parameter), output structure, and how rules are enforced. AI agents need to understand what parameter to pass, what violation categories are detected, and what the response contains.

data.current_description: Automatically detect unwanted content and enforce your moderation rules
data.description_suggestion: Analyzes provided content to detect unwanted material and policy violations using AI-powered moderation. Accepts content text or URL as a query parameter. Returns moderation results including violation categories, confidence scores, and recommended actions. Supports customizable moderation rules and severity thresholds.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is vague about input mechanism (query parameter), output structure, and how rules are enforced. AI agents need to understand what parameter to pass, what violation categories are detected, and what the response contains.

message: Operation 'html-renderer-post' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks clarity on input format (HTML markup vs URL), output format options, and configuration parameters. AI agents need to know what to send in the request body and what file format will be returned.

data.current_description: Generate high-quality PDF documents or images from HTML
data.summary_suggestion: Render HTML to PDF or image format
data.description_suggestion: Converts HTML content to high-quality PDF documents or image files (PNG, JPG). Accepts HTML markup or URL in the request body along with output format and rendering options. Returns the rendered document as a binary file in the specified format. Supports CSS styling, custom page sizes, and header/footer configuration.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks clarity on input format (HTML markup vs URL), output format options, and configuration parameters. AI agents need to know what to send in the request body and what file format will be returned.

message: Operation 'reverse-geocoding-get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description doesn't specify that coordinates are provided as query parameters or what address components are returned. AI agents need clarity on parameter names and response structure to use this operation effectively.

data.current_description: Effortlessly convert GPS coordinates to human-readable addresses
data.description_suggestion: Converts GPS latitude and longitude coordinates into human-readable street addresses. Accepts latitude, longitude, and optional parameters (language, result format) as query parameters. Returns address components including street, city, state, postal code, and country. Supports multiple languages and address formats.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description doesn't specify that coordinates are provided as query parameters or what address components are returned. AI agents need clarity on parameter names and response structure to use this operation effectively.

message: Operation 'unit-converter-get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is too generic about 'all different kinds' without specifying supported unit categories. AI agents need to know what parameters to provide (value, source unit, target unit) and what the response contains.

data.current_description: Quickly convert between all different kinds of measurement units
data.summary_suggestion: Convert between measurement and currency units
data.description_suggestion: Converts values between different measurement units and currencies. Accepts source value, source unit, and target unit as query parameters. Returns the converted value with the target unit. Supports length, weight, volume, temperature, time, and currency conversions with real-time exchange rates for currency.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too generic about 'all different kinds' without specifying supported unit categories. AI agents need to know what parameters to provide (value, source unit, target unit) and what the response contains.
